QuestData.Title: Cruel Taskmasters
QuestData.Description: You probably think most Broken are evil, don't you? In reality many just lack guidance.$B$BBefore I met the Omenai, I too was lost.$B$BOur minds suffered terrible pain from the orcs' demonic magic. We are easily confused and taken advantage of.$B$BDemons allied with Illidan raid Hellfire daily and capture our kind as slaves. With the Omenai we now have hope. Travel to the Ruins of Sha'naar, southwest of here, and slay the Illidari taskmasters so my people may be free!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 4 Illidari Taskmasters at the Ruins of Sha'naar and return to Ikan at the Temple of Telhamat in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've returned! Did you complete your task?
QuestData.RewardText: You did it! I'm in your debt, $n. Look at all the Dreghoods that are showing up.$B$BUnder my guidance they'll learn all about the old ways, you'll see.
